articles.title: Apple Has Reportedly Halted Foldable iPad Development, Likely Due To Manufacturing Difficulties; Lack Of Sufficient Demand For Tablets And Potentially Expensive Price Also Leading Factors - Wccftech
articles.description: A report claims that the development on the foldable iPad has been stopped due to production problems and the general lack of demand for tablets
articles.content: The next step to expand Apples foldable product range after the iPhone would undoubtedly be the iPad. Unfortunately, a report states that there have been a series of problems for the company, which h… [+2591 chars]

articles.title: This MRI Reads Your Brain’s Hidden Clock and Predicts Dementia Decades Ahead - SciTechDaily
articles.description: One MRI scan can now reveal how quickly you're aging. Faster aging links to poor memory, chronic illness, and earlier death. The tool gives a warning decades before symptoms begin.
articles.content: Imagine a tool to measure how fast you’re aging… while you’re still reasonably healthy. From a single MRI of your head, researchers can measure your aging rate and predict your risk of dementia and d… [+9055 chars]
